name: Rewind Time (allalonegamez)
description:
My game is a puzzle game where you can go back in time. All moved objects return to their original location after using that power. Once a chest is placed in the right place, it will no longer be affected by time. You can't rewind time when you are standing on the original location of a chest (so you have to memorize the location of all the chests).

Press Start (on gameboy) or Enter (Return)(on PC) to restart a level.

You can play the game in your gameboy (you can download the rom) or on this page.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How to play

PC :

Walk  :  Arrow Keys (or WASD)

Push a chest or Next text : Z (Alt or J)

Rewind time :  X (Ctrl or K)

Restart a level : Enter (Return)

Game Boy :

Walk  :  D-Pad

Push a chest or Next text : A

Rewind time :  B

 Restart a level : Start

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Follow me on twitter & itch for new levels.

Made in 3 days for the Game Boy Showdown.

Thanks for playing!
